articles.title: Argentine exchange: early soy in core farm belt hit by drought, outlook dry
articles.description: By Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Prolonged drought has left over a third of early planted soybeans in Argentina's core farming region in regular to poor condition, the Rosario grains exchange said late Thursday, adding more dry and hot weather was expected in the days ahead.Argentina is the world's leading exporter of processed soybean oil and meal, but an

articles.title: Giant 'rogue wave' hits Antarctica-bound cruise ship, leaving one dead and four injured
articles.description: A "rogue wave" hit the Viking Polaris earlier this week – when the Antarctica cruise was heading to Ushiaia, Argentina, AFP reported.
articles.content:
One person died and four others were injured after a giant "rouge wave" hit an Antarctica-bound cruise ship, travel company Viking confirmed to multiple outlets.

articles.description: In Qatar, on Messi's fifth and final quest, he has been the beating heart of the squad and Argentina appear to have as good a chance as any to lift the trophy on 18 December.
articles.content:
